Learn how to monitor and manage CKD effe: Kọ ẹkọ bi a ṣe le ṣakoso ati tọpinpin CKD ni ọna to munadoko. Ilera rẹ ni pataki julọ fun wa.
Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) is a condit: Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) jẹ ipo ti o jẹri pipadanu iṣẹ koda lọna ti o lọra lori akoko. Iwadii kutukutu ati iṣakoso jẹ pataki lati yago fun awọn iṣoro. Pẹpẹ wa nfunni ni awọn orisun pupọ lati ṣe iranlọwọ fun awọn ẹni-kọọkan ati awọn olupese itọju ilera lati gba iṣakoso lori iṣakoso CKD.
Learn the steps you can take to reduce t: Kọ ẹkọ awọn igbesẹ ti o le ṣe lati dinku ewu CKD, pẹlu mimu igbesi aye ilera, mimu omi to, ati awọn ayẹwo deede.
Get tools and insights to track kidney h: Gba awọn irinṣẹ ati imọ lati tọpinpin ilera koda, ṣe itupalẹ awọn aami, ati tọju atẹle ti ilera rẹ lapapọ.
Access detailed information about treatm: Gba alaye alaye nipa awọn eto itọju, awọn iyipada igbesi aye, ati itọsọna amoye ti a ṣe adani si awọn aini rẹ.
